name: @celo/moonpay-auth
description: Signs Moonpay requests with private api key
author: Celo

scripts.update-firebase-config:prod: firebase functions:config:set envs.public_key_staging=$(grep PUBLIC_KEY_STAGING .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-) envs.secret_key_staging=$(grep SECRET_KEY_STAGING .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-)
scripts.update-firebase-config:staging: firebase functions:config:set envs.public_key_prod=$(grep PUBLIC_KEY_PROD .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-) envs.secret_key_prod=$(grep SECRET_KEY_PROD .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-)
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use prod && yarn update-firebase-config:prod && firebase deploy --only functions:signMoonpayProd
scripts.deploy:staging: firebase use default && yarn update-firebase-config:staging && firebase deploy --only functions:signMoonpayStaging
